name: Tanks 3000 (C64)
description:
Attention: can only be played with 2 (or more) players!

Tanks 3000 is the fourth Protovision game for up to four players.

These games have enjoyed increasing popularity at scene parties since they offer a lot of entertainment for players and audience alike. And Tanks 3000 is no exception there!

Two to four players take to their tanks and battle against each other.

The objective is to destroy your adversaries with your guided rockets and to be the last man standing. And to make sure this won't get boring even after a lot of play, we thought of some special features for Tanks 3000...


You are welcomed to the game by an atmospheric intro, which is unusual for this kind of game. An option menu follows, with more options than are offered by most C64 games and you can adjust all of these settings at any time.

So if you thought you'd seen and experienced everything, you can find a new setting that will make the game feel fresh again.


Also available as Limited boxed deluxe version:
